resources.string:
You are about to set up Shelter.

This app depends on the Work Profile feature of Android to isolate the apps. If you use a vendor / custom ROM that breaks related features (e.g. MIUI), you should now QUIT and DO NOT use this app.

If you choose to continue, Shelter will ask for Device Admin permission and set up Work Profile for you.

If you are a developer and would like to make Shelter work on those incompatible ROMs like MIUI, pull requests are always welcome. The developer takes ABSOLUTELY NO RESPONSIBILITY if you break your device running an incompatible ROM.
Shelter needs to become Device Admin in order to perform its isolation tasks.
You have to grant Device Admin permission for Shelter to work. Please try again.
Please wait while we prepare Shelter profile for you …
Shelter setup complete. Now restarting Shelter. If Shelter didn\'t start automatically, you may launch it again from your launcher.
Permission is denied or Unsupported device
Work profile not found. Please restart the app to re-provision the profile.
Cannot provision work profile. You may try again by restarting Shelter.
It looks like you have disabled Work Mode while starting Shelter. If you have enabled it now, please start Shelter again.
Cannot clone system apps to a profile that Shelter has no control of.
Cannot uninstall system apps in a profile thaáºžt Shelter has no control of.
Cannot add shortcuts to your launcher. Please contact the developer for more information.
All apps in \"Auto Freeze\" list have been frozen successfully.
